item.title: AI-Based Quality Control & Defect Detection Using Computer Vision in Manufacturing
item.description: A practical guide to defect detection using YOLOv8 and synthetic data generation with OpenCV for industrial quality control.

item.title: Semi-supervised Anomaly Detection using Auto Encoders
item.description: Proposes a convolutional autoencoder approach for semi-supervised anomaly detection in industrial optical inspection, with PyTorch implementation.

item.title: How to Train A Custom Object Detection Model with YOLO v5
item.description: A comprehensive tutorial on training YOLOv5 for custom object detection, covering data collection, annotation, and model configuration.

item.title: The Next AI Revolution: A Tutorial Using VAEs to Generate High-Quality Synthetic Data
item.description: Tutorial on leveraging the BasicVAE architecture to generate synthetic data and improve classification accuracy.

item.title: The practical guide for Object Detection with YOLOv5 algorithm
item.description: Detailed tutorial explaining how to efficiently train the object detection algorithm YOLOv5 on your own custom dataset.

item.title: Dynamic SOLO (SOLOv2) with TensorFlow for Better Understanding Computer Vision
item.description: A practical approach to instance segmentation using SOLOv2 and TensorFlow, serving as a powerful alternative to YOLO for custom object and defect detection.

item.title: Watershed Segmentation Using OpenCV
item.description: A comprehensive technical guide on using the watershed segmentation technique in OpenCV, applicable for industrial inspection and defect localization.
